title: To compete with machines, we become more human
description: Sure, AI lets us produce more content, faster and cheaper. I wouldn’t bet on that shortcut. Machines already handle regurgitation. It’s about time we asked what we’re actually doing. Let’s remind ourselves: Journalism isn’t just writing articles. Let’s put humans front and center — the readers we serve, engaging them more deeply, inviting them closer....
